### LaTeX & Math



* **Inline math example:**
The area is given by  $A = \pi r^2$ .
* **Block math example:**

 $$x(u,v) =
  \begin{cases}
    (1 + \tfrac{v}{2}\cos\tfrac{u}{2})\cos u,\\
    (1 + \tfrac{v}{2}\cos\tfrac{u}{2})\sin u,\\
    \tfrac{v}{2}\sin\tfrac{u}{2}
  \end{cases}$$
* **Matrix representation example:**

 $$\begin{bmatrix}
    \cos\theta & -\sin\theta \\
    \sin\theta & \phantom{-}\cos\theta
  \end{bmatrix}$$
* **Tensor structure example:**

 $$T_{ijk} =
  \begin{bmatrix}
    t_{111} & t_{112} \\
    t_{121} & t_{122}
  \end{bmatrix}_{k=1,2}$$
